data.lyric:
[ti:Always Forever]
[ar:Bryson Tiller]
[al:Always Forever]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Always Forever - Bryson Tiller (布莱森·提勒)
[00:01.42]Lyrics by：Bryson Tiller/Joshua "J-Louis" Huizar/Travis Walton/Michael Cerda
[00:02.84]Composed by：Bryson Tiller/Joshua "J-Louis" Huizar/Travis Walton/Michael Cerda
[00:04.27]Uh uh I guess
[00:08.20]I just think hmm
[00:11.01]We started talkin' like two years ago three years ago
[00:13.43]Maybe four years ago somethin' like that
[00:16.09]Uh it's tough you know it's somethin' like that
[00:23.06]Oh
[00:24.14]Uh-huh
[00:25.80]Yeah you know I tried to stop
[00:30.67]Yeah you know I tried
[00:32.22]I tried to give you a little less of my time
[00:35.46]Startin' to feel like I'm never in my right mind
[00:38.95]In my right mind
[00:40.73]In my right mind
[00:41.90]Is it the right time babe
[00:44.25]Is it the right time babe
[00:45.21]See you in the nighttime babe it's nighttime
[00:50.67]I wish you had feelings like mine baby
[00:53.09]Feels like I'm still just a homie
[00:55.22]Homie
[00:55.60]Actin' like you don't want me yeah
[00:57.93]My God do you feel me
[00:58.85]No oh oh shawty just don't do it for me
[01:00.73]Uh-uh
[01:01.16]You do it for me
[01:03.27]Yeah uh-uh
[01:03.53]Yeah say you're done doin' it for me then say bye
[01:06.34]Bye
[01:07.53]Say say bye
[01:08.38]Say bye bye bye
[01:10.50]Say-say now girl say bye
[01:12.33]Bye bye
[01:13.96]Say now say goodbye
[01:15.31]Say bye bye
[01:16.30]Say goodbye
[01:17.74]You know I tried I really tried
[01:22.54]Now you're right back on my mind
[01:24.29]I feel the time just tick tick tick tick tick passin' by
[01:27.53]Thought this was always forever so I'm askin' why
[01:30.76]Would you lie to me babe
[01:34.05]Know that ain't right to me baby
[01:37.37]You know I was here to stay
[01:39.99]Ain't really got much left to say
[01:42.19]Please say you're done doin' it for me then say bye
[01:46.51]Say say bye
[01:47.45]Say bye bye bye baby you want me
[01:49.57]Say-say now girl say bye
[01:51.23]Bye why you just leave me
[01:53.12]Say now say goodbye
[01:54.24]Say bye bye the memories
[01:55.60]Say goodbye
[01:56.53]They haunt me yeah girl I'm
[01:58.30]Overloaded
[02:00.02]On all the memories and all the moments yeah
[02:03.41]When I look back to them it's hard to focus
[02:05.90]Oh I'd like to imagine the time ain't frozen
[02:08.93]Frozen
[02:09.39]Oh don't tell no lies you wasn't mine
[02:12.31]But hit my line up
[02:13.60]Why 'cause you was tired of somebody
[02:16.47]Somebody
[02:17.04]I won't say his name I'm simply tryna forget everything
[02:22.24]Since you don't remember anything
data.trans:
[ti:Always Forever]
[ar:Bryson Tiller]
[al:Always Forever]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:01.42]//
[00:02.84]//
[00:04.27]我猜
[00:08.20]我想
[00:11.01]我们从两年前 还是三年前开始认识 
[00:13.43]或许是在四年前 差不多这样的时间
[00:16.09]我们相识已久 这让一切变得太艰难 
[00:23.06]//
[00:24.14]//
[00:25.80]你知道吗 我试着不去想你
[00:30.67]你知道吗 我尝试过
[00:32.22]试着慢慢忘记你
[00:35.46]但我感觉不对劲
[00:38.95]心乱如麻
[00:40.73]心乱如麻
[00:41.90]时机是否适合 宝贝
[00:44.25]时机是否适合 宝贝
[00:45.21]深夜与你相见 宝贝 深夜
[00:50.67]我希望你能感同身受 宝贝
[00:53.09]感觉我只是你的一个朋友
[00:55.22]只是朋友罢了
[00:55.60]你一副不想与我亲近的模样
[00:57.93]你能感受到我的热切内心吗
[00:58.85]不要这样 姑娘 别这样对我
[01:00.73]//
[01:01.16]你竟如此对我
[01:03.27]//
[01:03.53]你说我们好戏结束 该是时候道别
[01:06.34]道别
[01:07.53]互相道别
[01:08.38]互说再见 姑娘
[01:10.50]说再见 就现在 姑娘
[01:12.33]再见
[01:13.96]说再见 就现在
[01:15.31]再见
[01:16.30]再见
[01:17.74]你知道吗 我真的努力尝试忘记你
[01:22.54]但你再次 浮现在我的脑海难挥去
[01:24.29]时光易逝
[01:27.53]曾以为我们可以天长地久 所以我想问你
[01:30.76]为何对我撒谎 宝贝
[01:34.05]你明白这对我不公平 宝贝
[01:37.37]你知道吗 我想留在你的身边
[01:39.99]我想说的话 都一一对你吐露
[01:42.19]就说我们好戏结束 该是时候道别
[01:46.51]互相道别
[01:47.45]互说再见 姑娘 宝贝 你是否渴望着我
[01:49.57]说再见 就现在 姑娘
[01:51.23]再见 你大可直接离开我
[01:53.12]说再见 就现在
[01:54.24]我将回忆埋藏
[01:55.60]互说再见
[01:56.53]往事不断涌上心头
[01:58.30]让我感觉沉重不已
[02:00.02]过去回忆 点点滴滴
[02:03.41]当我回首往事 便会魂不守舍
[02:05.90]此刻感觉时间冻结 我多希望时光匆匆
[02:08.93]不再冻结
[02:09.39]别再对我撒谎 你已经不属于我
[02:12.31]仔细聆听此曲
[02:13.60]你已厌倦某人
[02:16.47]某人
[02:17.04]我不会指名道姓 我只是想忘却所有
[02:22.24]既然你也将一切抛之脑后 忘却一切
